snippet: Mr. Lancaster was an alto saxophonist who took part in the great wave of free jazz inspired by John Coltrane.
abstract: Byard Lancaster, an alto saxophonist who took part in the great wave of free jazz inspired by John Coltrane and which then diversified far into other music and cultures, dies at age 70.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lancaster was an alto saxophonist who took part in the great wave of free jazz inspired by John Coltrane.

headline.seo: Byard Lancaster, Jazz Alto Saxophonist, Dies at 70
headline.main: Byard Lancaster, Jazz Alto Saxophonist, Dies at 70
